== About Us ==

The <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-beginners-launchpad |'''Launchpad Focus Group''']]</nowiki> exists to help BT members become familiar with using <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net|Launchpad]]</nowiki>. Our focus groups goals are to educate members on <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net|Launchpad]]</nowiki> and to use Launchpad's tools to contribute to Ubuntu and the community.  
<<BR>>

== Objectives ==
* Educate members on the many tools available on Launchpad.
* Help members get involved in either LP Answers, Bug Triage, and/or Translations.
== Current Tasks ==
* Look over <nowiki>[[https://help.launchpad.net/ |  the Launchpad help pages.]]</nowiki>
* To learn more about Bug Triage read <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/HowToTriage | the  How to Triage page.]]</nowiki> Here is a nice <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/HowToTriage/Charts | Flow Chart]]</nowiki> outlining the process. <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BugSquad/KnowledgeBase | Bug Squad's Knowledge Base]]</nowiki> contains a collection of very informative links on Bug Triage.
* If you are bilingual help out with <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ | Translations.]]</nowiki> For information on Translations read <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Translations/ | the Translations page ]]</nowiki>.
* Look through <nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/ | Launchpad Answers ]]</nowiki> for some questions you can help with.

=== Joining the Focus Group ===

If you are interested in joining the Launchpad Focus Group you need to be a Member or a Prospective Member of the Ubuntu Beginners Team. If you are already a member please join the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-beginners-launchpad|Focus Group on Launchpad]]</nowiki> and add your Launchpad ID and skills to the <nowiki>[[BeginnersTeam-FocusGroups-Launchpad-Members|Members Skills]]</nowiki> page. If you are not a member of the Ubuntu Beginners Team, and just a prospective member of the team you can join and participate with the team you just ca not join the Launchpad Team for the Focus Group.

=== Focus Group Members ===

Find out more information about current and pending members and their skills on the <nowiki>[[BeginnersTeam-FocusGroups-Launchpad-Members|Members Skills]]</nowiki> page.

For more information on the Launchpad Focus Group's projects, please look at the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu-beginners-launchpad-projects|projects page]]</nowiki> on Launchpad.
